Package com.cmput301.recipebot.util

Utility classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppConstants
    Class to store constant values shared across multiple componets of the app.
    BitmapUtils
    A utiltiy class to wrap our bitmap logic in.
    BitmapUtils.DecodeBitmapTask
    A task that decodes the an image from a Base64 encoded string into an imageview.
    LogUtils
    Helper methods that make logging more consistent throughout the app.
    NetworkUtils
    Logic for working with network stuff.
    TestDataSetGenerator
    A utilty class to generate some test data.
